user_query: I'm organizing a basketball tournament and I need to gather information about the players. Can you provide me with a list of all the players from different seasons? Additionally, I want to include some interesting trivia facts about numbers during the tournament. Can you find me a math fact and a trivia fact?

TaskList.description: Gather a list of all basketball players from different seasons participating in the tournament.
Compile trivia facts related to numbers during the basketball tournament.
Retrieve an interesting math fact that relates to basketball statistics.
Gather an interesting trivia fact related to basketball.
